attributes.action: end the Radio Sheffield 'Sheffield club' bias so they cover Barnsley and Donny Rovers alternately live on the AM frequency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Radio Sheffield shows a never ending bias to Sheffield clubs. 

This doesn't tally with the amount of money paid to fund the BBC by the residents of Doncaster, Barnsley, Rotherham and Chesterfield. 

Radio Sheffield has offered Barnsley an appalling 3.5 times less money than Sheff Wed and Sheff Utd to cover their games despite them being in the same division. Barnsley will also receive much less coverage - even if they're top of the league. 

Let's end the bias. Vote now.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
